definition[0]: the busy public parts of a city where there is a lot of activity, excitement, and crime, or where people without homes live
example[0]: She felt quite safe walking the streets after dark.
example[1]: Children as young as five are left to roam the streets (=walk around the streets) at night.
example[2]: street musicians (=ones who play on the street)
example[3]: She has written about the realities of street life  (=living on the streets).
example[4]: young people living on the streets
